articles.author: Nic Savage
articles.title: Cricket star hospitalised after fireball crash
articles.description: India wicketkeeper Rishabh Pant has been hospitalised following a car accident near Roorkee in Uttarakhand.
articles.content:
India wicketkeeper Rishabh Pant has been hospitalised following a car accident near Roorkee in Uttarakhand.
According to local reports, the 25-year-old’s car collided with a highway road divider whi… [+1192 chars]

articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: Cricket Fraternity Wishes Speedy Recovery To Rishabh Pant After Car Crash
articles.description: After Rishabh Pant got injured in the road accident, people from all walks of life took to Twitter and wished the cricketer a speedy recovery
articles.content: India wicketkeeper-batter Rishabh Pant on Friday sustained injuries after his car collided with the divider and caught fire while he was travelling from Delhi to Uttarakhand. He was driving his Merce… [+4125 chars]

articles.title: Azeem Rafiq: Hate crime inquiry after man defecates in cricketer's garden
articles.description: Ex-Yorkshire bowler Azeem Rafiq says he has been abused since highlighting racism at his old club.
articles.content:
A hate crime investigation has been started by police after a man defecated in the garden of former Yorkshire cricketer Azeem Rafiq.
Earlier this month, the ex-bowler told MPs he had become a target… [+1501 chars]

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
